rooms.description: An open plan living and kitchen area integrated with natural light from large windows. Designed in a modern style with clean lines, minimalistic decor and functional kitchen elements.
Spacious bedroom with ample natural light and modern design elements. Incorporates Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Functional bathroom adjoining the bedroom. Designed with modern fixtures and privacy considerations.
Dedicated library space with built-in shelving and comfortable seating. Positioned to receive ample natural light without direct sun exposure.
Utility area for laundry and storage. Located conveniently near the kitchen and living area.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned to the north as per Vastu principles.
Large windows on the south and east walls providing ample natural light and ventilation.
Doorway connecting bedroom to hallway ensuring privacy and ease of access.

garden_area.description: Large garden area occupying approximately 30% of the plot. Landscaping includes native plants and water features.

design_principles: Modern single-story design with emphasis on natural light, open spaces, and functional zoning in compliance with Indian residential standards.
